dmca.title: Pearson Education schools Blogger over links to infringing e-books
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam: 

This office represents Pearson Education, Inc. ("Pearson"), which owns among other publishing imprints the Addison Wesley, Cisco Press, New Riders, Prentice Hall, Quo, and Sams imprints. It has come to our attention that the person responsible for the weblog www.cooldogebooks.blogspot.com, has posted links to websites that reproduce, display and distribute unauthorized digital copies 776 Pearson books. 

The provision of links on www.cooldogebooks.blogspot.com to such websites that reproduce, display and distribute unauthorized digital copies of the Pearson works is considered to be a contributory infringement of Pearson's copyright and exclusive rights as the publisher of the works under United States copyright law and international copyright treaties.

I have a good faith belief that the materials identified below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material(s) or item(s) claimed to be infringing. 

Infringing Web Pages 

http://cooldogebooks.blogspot.com/2006/06/prentice-hall.html
http://cooldogebooks.blogspot.com/2006/05/new-riders.html
http://cooldogebooks.blogspot.com/2006/05/que-books.html
http://cooldogebooks.blogspot.com/2006/05/addison-wesley.html
http://cooldogebooks.blogspot.com/2006/05/cisco-ebooks.html
http://cooldogebooks.blogspot.com/2006/07/rapidshare-links.html

Copyrighted Works 
1. Prentice Hall - ado net programming in visual basic net 
2. Prentice Hall - agile management for software engineering applying the theory of constraints for business results 
3. Prentice Hall - and dignity for all 
4. Prentice Hall - a practical guide to enterprise architecture
5. Prentice Hall - bea weblogic server administration kit

7. Prentice Hall - com programming, a practical guide using visual c and atl
8. Prentice Hall - computer networks, 4th edition

10. Prentice Hall - core j2ee patterns, 2nd ed
11. Prentice Hall - core java 2 volumne i fundamentals

14. Prentice Hall - core java data objects
15. Prentice Hall - core php programming, 3rd edition

17. Prentice Hall - core web programming, 2nd edition
18. Prentice Hall - creating regional wealth in the innovation economy
19. Prentice Hall - critical thinking, tools for taking charge of your professional and personal life
20. Prentice Hall - css, dhtml and javascript
21. Prentice Hall - db2 version 8 the official guide
22. Prentice Hall - designing a data warehouse, supporting customer relationship management
23. Prentice Hall - enterprise data center design automation
24. Prentice Hall - enterprise javabeans component architecture designing and coding enterprise applications

[16 more pages of listed items 55-776]


I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named Pearson Education, Inc. ("IP Owner"). 
Should you require additional information regarding this matter, I may be contacted at:
